questionTitle: Your brother seldom takes you to the circus, ....... ?
"My father's coming back from his vacation." ".........................."
anwers: He was gone for two weeks.
I hope the vacation was boring.
It's usually very nice in this month.
I didn't know he was away.

questionTitle: Is Jones her brother? No, but he related ........ her.

He directed that no one ............. eat before sunset.
If you ...................... these difficult exercises, you won't be good at maths.
Traveling by air is not cheap ............ is it interesting.
Traveling by air is not cheap. And it isn't interesting ..........
I have no idea ..................... the interview will take.
"Do I have to take that English course?" "No, you ........................"
Yes, ............, I wouldn't have let her kill herself.
